lines.text: Well, we're looking for something that could start a fire...
We didn't find any matches, but a matchbook could've just burnt up.
If they did it on purpose, they could've disposed of the evidence easily.
But... there's probably something that was <c=#FF00FF>already on fire</c> when Slick showed up.
Something that the <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard</c> might've had access to right away...
